articles.title: Karin Kirk: The worn out fossil fuel playbook — trust us, climate change is fine, really!
articles.author: Karin Kirk Guest columnist
articles.summary: Terry Anderson's recent column is another chapter in the tired myth that pollution paves the way to prosperity. Anderson was a witness for the state in Montana's youth climate trial. He got his math wrong several times, confused Montana's emissions with that of the entire Mountain West region, used 2022 greenhouse gas emissions data, even though data had only been released through 2020. He used old data to make people think things haven't changed much in the last 10 years. His biggest mistake is the idea that we must choose between a healthy environment and a healthy economy. Montana has the seventh-largest wind potential in the country. We can lower pollution and grow energy jobs.
